channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Synaptics Smart Audio UWP App
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Synaptics Smart Audio UWP App

item.title: CVE-2020-8337|2024-08-04T09:56:28.336Z -- lenovo -- synaptics%20smart%20audio%20uwp%20app
item.description: An unquoted search path vulnerability was reported in versions prior to 1.0.83.0 of the Synaptics Smart Audio UWP app associated with the DCHU audio drivers on Lenovo platforms that could allow an administrative user to execute arbitrary code.
